articles.author: Aitor Hernández-Morales
articles.title: Sánchez on the edge: Will Spain's prime minister resign? - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: His ultimate decision could result in very different scenarios for Spain, and could impact negotiations over the new leaders of the EU’s institutions.
articles.content: Sánchez has spent the past five days secluded, meditating on his future. Supporters and opponents alike now await a decision that has the potential to radically alter Spain’s political landscape and … [+2413 chars]
